website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an inexpensive, approachable smartphone with a few more features, the Nokia Lumia 820's price tag is tough to beat.
pros: AT&T's Nokia Lumia 820 offers Windows Phone 8, 4G LTE, and a terrifically low subsidized price
cons: This Lumia is heavy, a little slippery, and has a short battery life

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase from Ross Cellular - The phones are Refurbished!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't purchase from Ross Cellular - The phones are Refurbished, my phone had a lifetime timer of 72 hours you can check by ##634# on any Lumia phone. The phone is ATT branded but unlocked. Has a aftermarket back cover there was no NOKIA logo on it. The screen and lens have a plastic cover on top. Which makes the outside look deceivingly new. - Updated the phone to latest Windows 8.1 took 6 hours and 5 updates to move to latest version. WP 8.1 is much better compared to WP 8 looks good. Tested with both ATT and T-Mobile SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Accent

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Lumia 820 just looks like Windows 8 on your
customer_reviews.text: Nokia Lumia 820 just looks like Windows 8 on your Tablet, Laptop, and Desk Top computer. The Apps download to the phone are fabulous. One small trouble the App is not always, compatible with this phone. But hopefully they can work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Northwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with a affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone just loved it, previously used Iphone 4S, Samsung Galaxy S4. But, Nokia came with an excellent phone with a affordable phone. The only area they should need to look at is the battery. But, if you use power saver mode then you can handle that. Other than that this phone has all the features like the big boys have and at a half price. If you want a good product than you can have it. But, if you need name "iphone" for $600/$700 then that is your personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Product buyer

customer_reviews.title: I' m really happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I' m really happy with this phone. I was going to get an android, but because my husband is less "techy" my son felt it would be better for him to have a Windows-based phone. I decided to get the same thing, so we could learn together. I'm totally happy with it, and a bonus is that my husband can see the screen without his reading glasses and it does just about anything he wants it to do...plus I've got apps to make my life easier. The price was great, and the phone is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a super phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone works in many locations out side of the USA . Software updates are a breeze and I am not missing the android platform . Another great Nokia phone . I am a trained photographer, with a few DSLRs , this phone takes good pictures , if you know your settings it will take even better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Not factory unlocked, but a great phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm a techie. I love gadgets, I've had iPhones, Androids, Symbian, Blackberries, Windows 4.5 (remember that one). The interface is clean and smooth, the phone performs great, pictures are crisp and clear and even under low-light conditions they look great. I would definitely recommend this for the business oriented. I'd actually be tempted to take up Windows 8 if I didn't have my Galaxy S3 just the way I want it. This was purchased for my brother and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Gift for My Relative
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have one that you can use when you travel outside the U.S.A. because it is compatible with all the carrier around the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Ok Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is really not an unlocked phone. It looks like the AT&T locked phone is unlocked by the code and delivered. It still has AT&T default apps which you see in the locked phones. I contacted Ross Cellular on this, they replied that this model is AT&T branded, so you will have all those apps. Even though it worked with different carrier (tried T-Mobile), but if you are really looking for an unlocked phone don't get this model. And more over, the bundle did not have headphone, the charger and the user manual looked cheap, i guess they are not the real Nokia ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarath Chandran

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nokia Lumia 820 for my daughter a few months ago and she is very happy with it. Her mom was so happy with the phone that I had to replace her new galaxy S4 with a Nokia Lumia 1020. Nokia is a much better brand !!! If only people knew that !!!
customer_reviews.author: Maxxime

customer_reviews.title: battery did NOT last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this phone...and both battery life shelves were very poor!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Way More Than I Expected!!:D
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone very quickly, within 48 hours of ordering I believe, actually! I am Very satisfied! I was stoked to have found a quality phone for such a great discounted price, AND to have gotten such great & timely service too!?!? More than I expected,I will ABSOLUTELY be returning for my next phone upgrade when the time comes!..and if anyone I kno is looking for one, I will surely send them in your direction,Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Nokia Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed, colourful handset with some excellent technological features, Windows Phone is maturing nicely, and the 820 has got a really palatable price point to boot. It's been overshadowed by others in the range, but that doesn't mean it isn't still a class act. Very good and nice device if you want to upgrade your old phone. For me I received all the benefits I was looking for: Attractive design, microSD support, Great screen and Powerful camera.
customer_reviews.author: Julio C. Montiel

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished at&t phone received in very good condition. I'm not sure if the battery is ...
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished at&t phone received in very good condition. I'm not sure if the battery is the original, but the charger is cheap generic 500 mAh. When connecting the phone to the wifi, immediately it got windows phone upgrades to version 8.1. Good hardware, interesting operating system. As I had read in reviews, some poor performance battery (1650 mAh). Currently operating in LTE 1800 (Digitel Venezuelan carrier)
customer_reviews.author: Fausto Torres

customer_reviews.title: it did not work in Turkey or in the USA ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought nokia lumia 820 for my mom. she could not use it in Turkey. however, she is the US now and she cannot use it either. it is asking for pin number. where should I find the pin code? It did not work in Turkey or in the USA because of a pin code issue. Really !!! unlocked ?
customer_reviews.author: Deniz

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This Phone is so awesome at first i had problems connecting to my tmobil network but after two days it started to work perfectly i love this phone and how integrated is this phone is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I never been a fan of Windows phone. I brought his phone for my friend. I'm surprised by the functionality and quality of phone. It is impressive design and camera is awesome. My friend loved it. Great price compared to any other products of same features.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: this one is amazing. Grandma loved my phone and can't see or ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this one is amazing. Grandma loved my phone and can't see or tell the difference in a cheaper phone. Plus I still think this phone is BETTER THAN AN IPHONE AT UNDER $200 OFF CONTRACT
customer_reviews.author: Denver Moskel

customer_reviews.title: Good power, good photos
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, arrived new as promised. Good power, good photos, nothing to complain about and no contracts to satisfy. Works great with straight talk sim.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price, just choose well who you buy it from...
customer_reviews.text: As any nokia device, Lumia 820 is solid and have great connectivity, deserves 5 stars; just be careful who you buy it from, there's a lot of swindlers like BREED around Amazon Store. This phone has a very good camera (better than any iPhone I've used) and for the price you get a reliable tool for your everyday tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Former At&T phone
customer_reviews.text: It is an ulocked former AT&T phone with all the associated AT&T logos and apps on the phone and in the programs. Works great and i just love this phone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Received the phone on time and in good working order from the merchant
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone on time and in good working order from the merchant. The phone worked well on AT&T network for the first month. Shortly after that it was dropped from about 18" and the glass shattered. It pays to buy a phone with Gorilla Glass or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Brent McIlquham

customer_reviews.title: A good phone for the value
customer_reviews.text: A good phone for the value. dropped mine after 6 months and broke it though, although I didn't have a case.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Felton

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Works mostly. This phone runs really hot. I am refraining from this 820 model.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: / Excellent product, I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.text: Excelente producto, lo recomiendo 100%. / Excellent product, I recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Marzan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Just made the switch from Android to WP8 and so far I love it. If i could have google maps and a free music downloading app it would be flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Thank you guys, the phone is doing great. This is my first Lumia and i will say is a good alternative between others. The camera is great and the apps from WPS for it are also great. I just didn't knew the phone came without the headphones, if i had know that, i had buy the headphones with it. Now i have to use the old one's till i got $ again. :/
customer_reviews.author: Mario B.

customer_reviews.title: Christian Martinez
customer_reviews.text: Excelelente tlf very fast very beautiful, I really like, so good tlf recommend this to any user, nokia best ..!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked out of the box and was my first Windows Phone. I would like to see more apps on the Windows Store.
customer_reviews.author: Cui Huang

customer_reviews.title: Fast and simple.
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate why people gave this phone so scathing reviews. The phone is good, and functions properly. I have been enjoying it seen I bought it. Though windows platform is young, I don't think I will be going back to any other OS any time soon. So simple to use. Good phone, packed with wonderful specs, at a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Abello

customer_reviews.title: GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: got my phone early all charged up and ready to put in SIM card and start using. GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Phylis Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my phone was skeptical at first but bought it,got it & love it
customer_reviews.author: Sk V

customer_reviews.title: Is this phone really new???? IMPOSSIBLE ...
customer_reviews.text: Is this phone really new???? IMPOSSIBLE!!!! The most important aspect of the phone - the turning on feature/power button- does not work. This is obviously a refurbished JUNK!! Buyers save yourself the MISERY and STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he's super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa St. John

customer_reviews.title: Like the 820
customer_reviews.text: Like the 820, windows 8, upgraded to 8.1, same as my pc, don't have to learn a new system, fast shipping, works as posted and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Only shortcomings is short battery life even with battery saver turned on
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin1661

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is to hard to open to place in your SIM Card are battery.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: i received a used phone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the phone i received is used. I can tell because it has no protective stickers anywhere besides the screen and the back shell is damaged from being too manipulated, I'm guessing by the las user. I have bought one before from another store so i know how a new one should be right our of the box. Im currently out of the states so there's nothing i can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Herrera Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: So far its a good phone, seems far less glitchy than other phones ...
customer_reviews.text: So far its a good phone, seems far less glitchy than other phones I've had in the past. The only complaint I have is that the front camera tends to get filled with dust, it needs to have a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I have ever owned worked fine for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I have ever owned worked fine for about two weeks then after updates freezes like all windows products. If this was an occasional problem I could overlook it but it happens every day several times I would not recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable phone.
customer_reviews.author: Quan68

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: The Nokia Lumia 820 is an excellent phone and windows 8 is very stable. Yes, the battery discharges very quickly and the slot for the mini SD card and the sim card are very hard to use. I bought this cell phone as factory unlocked but what I received was an AT&T cellphone with the code to unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Agustin Garcia Padron

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartphone. Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great Smartphone. Works perfect, fast, easy to use, nice camera, nice touch panel... This is an excellent option who need a trustful and confortable smartphone. It doesn't came with Windows 8.1, but I hope to get the update really soon. I reccomend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Radan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a phone that I can check some email, make a call and send text messages - this exceeded what I wanted and since I am not into all the "fancy stuff" his meets my needs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, I tried the Lumia 520 first and it was a good phone but it doesn't compare to this one. Better camera, sharper screen. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: lakehome80

customer_reviews.title: I really like this phone because it really fills all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone because it really fills all my expectations, the only thing i did not like is that mine has the at&t and that it does not bring earphone besides that i am really happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Federico H.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm not entirely sure what to rate... but I believe I got this on time, it was in good condition, and I love the phone. I've had one before but I accidentally broke it's screen and I had no idea how to fix it, so I got a new one and it's quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great phone to get yourself into the Windows Phone OS
customer_reviews.text: Great phone to get yourself into the Windows Phone OS! It's fast and reliable, plus it takes a beating in case you tend to drop it on the ground :)
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Yépez

customer_reviews.title: Phone seemed to be a good phone, but the screen has completely gone out
customer_reviews.text: Phone seemed to be a good phone, but the screen has completely gone out. We cannot get in touch with Ross Cellular to discuss returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone did ok until it just stopped charging. Won't turn on at all now.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cool phone which I can rely on. One thing that I don't like is the low application support in Windows Phone. I miss many apps, especially the google ones and most google websites won't even load properly in Internet Explorer for phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked but actually locked!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone almost two months ago. Great phone but unfortunately I couldn't use it in Europe despite the fact that it was advertised as unlocked. What a bummer..!
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios Theodoropoulos

customer_reviews.title: refurbished product sold as new
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cell, unlocked, but it's refurbished, the charger is not from Nokia, and doesn't have any earphones, I'm quite disappointed, they should say this this before you pay it as if it were new.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Matheus

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: They never reached the headphones and the battery is not original, part of the rear camera arrived detached , do not recommend them .

customer_reviews.title: faulty item never booted not got any replacement waste of money $180 can anybody take this responsbility it ...

customer_reviews.title: Windows compatible
customer_reviews.text: Except for the below average battery life between charges, this is a complementary device for those who use a Windows operating system.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice cell phone. But it only has traditional Chinese no simplified Chinese. Not so convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cellphone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, easy to use and very fast to open applications, the photos are expectaculares like the videos, the signal is very good and your operating system surprised me!!

customer_reviews.title: nokia lumia 820
customer_reviews.text: Very good product very good transaction order arrived on time. Phone carrier took a while getting sim card to me so l Could be sure product worked. All is well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it more than I expected it works very well here in Venezuela with Movistar
customer_reviews.author: jose rincones

customer_reviews.title: Its what I expected in a sub $200 unlocked phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Its what I expected in a sub $200 unlocked phone. Came new in box. Works, has some features. Nothing flashy or flagship here but it's also $400 cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Cool phone, unlocked so it can be used anywhere in the world. Highly recommend it. Go for it without second thoughts.

customer_reviews.title: Thanx
customer_reviews.text: This is to let you know that the purchase was what I expected. It initialy had a problem but this was due to an update from nokia. The phone works just fine, THANK YOU MUCH!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Phone was unlocked as advertised and started working instantly when the sim card was placed in.

customer_reviews.text: Great phone, too limited on apps though..... Windows needs to step it up on the available apps.

customer_reviews.text: Good price for a windows phone that is unlocked and can be used in the US as well as in Europe

customer_reviews.text: The phone 📞 work very good, I love ❤ it the. Phone look very. New, I don't have any problem with it

customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and in perfect condition.The cellphone is exactly like the description says, it came unlocked and works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Product was fairly good..good condition. only problem is with poor call quality occasionally and screen colour goes sometimes, but overall good

customer_reviews.title: ... button was sensitive I found the cell to be amazing i am loving it 😁 😉
customer_reviews.text: While the power button was sensitive I found the cell to be amazing i am loving it 😁 😉

customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone worthy to buy! I like it. It's thin and battery is long lasting and camera is great.

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Lumia 820 Reburfished
customer_reviews.text: Nokia lumia 820 Refurbished is like a new. Is a nice cell phone. I'm from Venezuela and this cell phone is working perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: this phone is great, if you planning to buy it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this phone is great, if you planning to buy it, then you won't be let down.

customer_reviews.text: Got what I wanted and it came sooner than expected.

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing it was in pristine condition. Very great and smart buy.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. The phone doesnot look new at all
customer_reviews.text: Don't Buy, Horrible quality. The phone does not look new.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone !!
customer_reviews.text: Though I ordered for an UNLOCKED phone, It was locked to AT & T network which was quite disappointing. Amazon did not sort out the issue, other than sending a return label. I was outside US, needed the unlock code badly, so I contacted the seller Myparana directly and they got me the code in a couple of days. Phone as such is awesome, voice quality is good, internet connectivity works great, camera is good, screen resolution is nice. Coolest feature is internet sharing, you can use this phone as a wireless router !! I am very happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: NP Kumar

customer_reviews.title: This phone was registered as STOLEN by AT&T and they ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone was registered as STOLEN by AT&T and they therefore would not validate the SIM card for it. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: item did not match descriprion
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived is an AT&T locked phone so I couldn't use it
customer_reviews.author: NadavR

customer_reviews.title: deeply disappointed by the product I received
customer_reviews.text: deeply disappointed by the product I received, I ordered a nokia lumia 820 factory unlocked that could be used on any carrier in Venezuela and they sent me an AT & T locked, I am very disappointed, I feel ripped off simply because a publication does not fit with reality .. .
customer_reviews.author: Angelitotrece

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool phone, but the only thing that i don't like is the performance of the battery and when the phone reach his last source of energy its impossible to charge with the default charger. Other thing has a trick its the protector of the lens and the light flash you can tear off and ruin ur cam when u need to quit the back cover of the phone Everything else I find it nice practical to use. The apps need to develop faster because other brands have more and nice apps than nokia platform.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE GUTIERREZ R

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the phone in perfect condition as it was described. Once i tried to use it didn't work. I tried different phone companies and nothing. I live in the Dominican Republic, the phone doesn't appear to be unlocked. I have tried to unlock it here and an error appears. Please help me, in the time being i have the price of this phone lost since i can't sell it because of the error. I hope i recieve son assistance on this matter!!!
customer_reviews.author: i.molina

customer_reviews.title: bad design with the camera flash
customer_reviews.text: The shipping time and packaging was correct. But I have two complaints: the manual inside the box is for Nokia 920 not the 820 phone. and second, the phone camera flash is a little part in the back that doesn't fit very well. It looks is gonna falls off in a second. Sometimes, the flash is not working and is because this part is loosen.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking phone w/ issues
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked well as spec on the phone with the exception of very limited battery life (ran out in 5 hours after fully charged w/ only limited call/text use) and data connection did not function properly even after discussions w/ T-Mobile and Nokia tech. Will be getting a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Anderson

customer_reviews.title: First Windows Phone. 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out the device because I got so used to Symbian Belle. Love it so far. Still can't figure out where or how to explore files on the device. Like File Manager on Symbian devices
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C.

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: Ok! Lumia 820 software is very good as mid range Wdph 8 category. It's weakness is the hardware a bit thick , weavy & dull designed.
customer_reviews.author: Lunus

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE
customer_reviews.text: awesome cellphone, quicky and easy of buy, not problem, the cellphone is excelente, and i hope buy later, i like it
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even power on
customer_reviews.text: No it did not meet my expectations, the phone never came on. By the time it was delivered to me overseas and whatnot, I realised that the time limit for returning the item may have passed. Now I'm out almost $200 with a phone that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Ag

customer_reviews.title: Great Cell Phone! Nokia fond it's way back!
customer_reviews.text: Great Cell Phone! Nokia fond it's way back! Windows Phone is easy to use and Nokia still has the best Hardware!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: The phone and OS are great. The problem is that it has an OEM ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone and OS are great. The problem is that it has an OEM digitizer and it freaks out, some times the phone starts "tapping" itself in chaos and has to be turn off by removing the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Vargas

customer_reviews.title: US Wireless and Amazon: Promised and not delivered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nokia L820 from US Wireless as new factory unlocked 4G LTE penta bands: (800/900/1800/2100/2600 MHz), however I received an AT&T unlocked Lumia 820 (Variant RM-824) which is a dual band LTE (1700/700 MHz). If this cell was AT&T device, this cell is not new, it was refurbished to be unlocked. The box is all worn out, dirty and like it was used before. Morover, this cell was offered as LTE penta band which, according to Nokia, has to be the Variant RM-825, which have the LTE band that i need for my carrier provider. So if they are offering something, they should stick to it, or make a real statement on what they are offering.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Monasterio

customer_reviews.title: Received on time but not unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when buying this phone. It came on time, before I left for Europe, but the phone was not unlocked as advertised. When I came to Europe and tried to use it with European SIM card it didn't work at all. I contacted the seller, who sent me unlocking code which didn't work too. They told me then to send it back to them. However, to cut the long story short, I couldn't use it when I needed the most.
customer_reviews.author: Sinisa Cutul

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap made in china
customer_reviews.text: When I answer the phone the screen goes black and you can't turn it off unless you squeeze both top corners to get the screen to come so you can hang up......what a piece of crap

customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received my new Nokia Lumia 820 unlocked phone and it will not turn on after charging.

customer_reviews.text: Very good the phone but it doesnt came with the original charger i didnt like that. Over all good satisfice

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't what it paid for
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received this product cause it looked like it was old, the box was very dirty and the Cellphone was from AT&T, when it supossed to be from the original Nokia Store. It was a dissappointment
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 820 8GB GSM 4G LTE Windows 8 Smartphone - Black - AT&T - No Warranty
product_meta.description: The Nokia Lumia 820 with 4G LTE and Windows Phone 8 is truly a value-priced powerhouse. Enjoy the fastest web browsing possible thanks to the 1.5GHz Dual-Core Snapdragon Qualcomm Processor, Internet Explorer 10, and much more. And full Windows Phone 8 interoperability allows unprecedented storage and backup.
feature_bullets: Display: AMOLED 480 x 800 pixels, 4.3 inches (~217 ppi pixel density)
Internal Memory: 8 GB storage, 1 GB RAM
Camera: 8 MP, 3264x2448 pixels, autofocus, Carl Zeiss Tessar lens, F2.2, dual LED flash
CPU: Dual-core 1.5 GHz Krait GPU: Adreno 225
